Welcome to FreeFree’s Documentation!¶

FreeFree¶

Motivations¶

There are always some books that we don’t need anymore but someone may want them. Although we can use second-hand platform to sell the books, sometimes we may want to just give or even throw them away since there is no insufficient space to store them. Also, sometimes we want some books for temporary use but it’s a waste to buy them. A free book give-way platform will help these people especially for students to get the books they need and give away the books then unwanted.

What is it¶

This web applicaion that aims to help people to get books they want for free. People can sign up to be a user and get the notifications of the availibilities to the books they need. Also, based on their locations some items have higher priorities to be recommended. Uses can use wishlist of ISBN number or book info to note which books they need. It’s a good way to help and benefit each other.

More features¶

  1. More items (like furniture, pet products) to be in the list

  2. Based on the owners’ intention, some items can be provided with a second-hand trading platform

API Documentation¶

class spider.book_item.Book¶
static calculate_start(page)¶

Returns an integer representing the start fitting in outside API function. Calculate the start index of the API function parameter by page and PER_PAGE.

Parameters

page (int) – Specified page number

Returns

start index

Return type

int

search_by_isbn(isbn)¶

Get formatted HTTP response by isbn number and record it in the books attribute.

Parameters

isbn (string) – The unique ID number in specific format of books used for search.

search_by_keyword(q, page=1)¶

Get formatted HTTP response by keyword q and specified page number page and record results in books attribute.

Parameters

  • q (string) – Keywords for searching books.

  • page (int) – Searched page numbe, defaults to 1.

class view_models.book.BookViewModel(book)¶
Parameters

  • pages (string) – number of book pages

  • price (string) – price of book

  • summary (string) – summary of book

  • image (string) – image of book

property intro¶

Return a string of short information of book like ‘author/publisher/price’ or ‘author/price’ when publisher is null or unknown.

Returns

short information of book

Return type

string

class view_models.book.BookCollection¶
fill(book_item, keyword)¶

Fill the book_item into a list of bookviewmodel objects

Parameters

  • book_item (obj) – Book Object containing book records

  • keyword (string) – The keyword used for searching the book_item

libs.helper.is_isbn_or_key(word)¶

Determine word is key or isbn

Parameters

word (string) – query keywords returning from HTTP response

Returns

isbn or key label

Return type

string

class libs.http_helper.HTTP¶
static get(url, return_json=True)¶

Reformat get response.

Parameters

  • url (string) – URl parameter passing to get method

  • return_json (boolean) – if returned format is json, defaults to True

Returns

HTTP response result in json or text

Type

string or json format
